name: reserve-a-seat-for-the-talks-and-attend-a-workshop--dunlap-valencia;issue-jira-6-browser-chrome-context-chrome-feature-02-register-registrationto-the-conference-capability-features-02-register-theme-features
title: Reserve a seat for the talks and attend a workshop (Dunlap Valencia)

testSteps.description: Given that Dunlap Valencia gets access to the ticket reservation page

children.description: Dunlap Valencia visits the conference page
Dunlap Valencia opens the browser at "/"
Dunlap Valencia maximises the browser window
Dunlap Valencia wants to register
Dunlap Valencia clicks on the Register button

testSteps.description: When he buys a quantity of 1 early tickets for the talks

children.description: Dunlap Valencia buys a quantity of 1 early tickets for the talks
Dunlap Valencia buys a quantity of 1 tickets of type early
Dunlap Valencia clicks on the Talks tab
Dunlap Valencia enters 1 into the Number of Early Tickets field

testSteps.description: And he buys a quantity of 5 tickets for the workshop Workshop A

children.description: Dunlap Valencia buys a quantity of 5 for the workshop Workshop A
Dunlap Valencia buys a quantity of 5 tickets of type Workshop A
Dunlap Valencia clicks on the Workshops tab
Dunlap Valencia enters 5 into the Number of Workshop A Tickets field

testSteps.description: And he fills the registration form with his personal info: Dunlap Valencia, denaHale, denahale@farmex.com, 02/01/1981, ELEMANTRA, 577 Guernsey Street - Teasdale - Massachusetts - 5234, Lutsen, 54372, Sweden

children.description: Dunlap Valencia fills the registration form with his Dunlap Valencia, denaHale, denahale@farmex.com, 02/01/1981, ELEMANTRA, 577 Guernsey Street - Teasdale - Massachusetts - 5234, Lutsen, 54372, Sweden
Dunlap Valencia scrolls to the Continue button of the tickets section
Dunlap Valencia clicks on the Continue button of the tickets section
Dunlap Valencia enters Dunlap Valencia into the Actor's Fullname
Dunlap Valencia enters denaHale into the Actor's Nickname
Dunlap Valencia enters denahale@farmex.com into the Actor's Email
Dunlap Valencia picks the date 2/1/1981 on the Actor's Date of Birth
Dunlap Valencia enters ELEMANTRA into the Actor's Company
Dunlap Valencia enters 577 Guernsey Street - Teasdale - Massachusetts - 5234 into the Actor's Address
Dunlap Valencia enters Lutsen into the Actor's City
Dunlap Valencia enters 54372 into the Actor's Zip
Dunlap Valencia selects "Sweden" from the Actor's Country
Dunlap Valencia clicks on the Continue button of the registration form

testSteps.description: Then he sees the message 'Thank you to have been registered to the AT conference'

children.description: Dunlap Valencia checks the text of the Thanking message for the registration
